front.title: IEEE Recommended Practice for Managing Natural Disaster Impact on Key Electrical Systems and Installations in Petroleum and Chemical Facilities

author.organization: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

front.abstract: Recommendations and guidelines for managing natural disaster impact on key electrical facilities and systems in petroleum and chemical facilities are provided in order to minimize economic damage by pre-assessment risk evaluation of electrical facilities, by identification of mitigation techniques and system designs to minimize impact, and by outlining procedures for faster recovery of electrical systems after a natural disaster.
